main event: Bright lights or stars were observed in the sky in Monroe, Louisiana, described as similar to Castor and Pollux but very bright and large.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 6-8 minutes,The shape of the object was described as resembling a Half Dollar,Three reddish objects were observed,The objects performed various maneuvers and traveled at a very fast speed,The observer was a male civilian, aged about 35-40.
sighted object: three bright lights or stars in the sky
